articles.title: OpenAI Announces 500 New AI Research Positions
articles.summary: OpenAI expands research team with 500 new positions focused on AGI safety and capabilities.

articles.title: Google Expands AI Team by 1,200 Engineers
articles.summary: Google announces major expansion of its AI division with 1,200 new engineering roles.

articles.title: Microsoft Invests in 800 AI Infrastructure Jobs
articles.summary: Microsoft creates 800 new positions to support Azure AI infrastructure.

articles.title: Bank of America Automates 2,000 Back Office Roles
articles.summary: Bank of America implements AI systems to automate 2,000 back office positions.

articles.title: Amazon Retrains 5,000 Warehouse Workers for AI Roles
articles.summary: Amazon launches major reskilling program to transition warehouse workers to AI-assisted roles.

articles.title: Meta Reduces Content Moderation Team by 1,500
articles.summary: Meta reduces human content moderation team as AI systems take over review processes.

articles.title: Anthropic Raises $2B, Plans 300 New Hires
articles.summary: Anthropic secures major funding round and announces plans for 300 new research positions.

articles.title: JPMorgan Implements AI Trading, Cuts 800 Traders
articles.summary: JPMorgan's new AI trading system reduces need for 800 human traders.

articles.title: Tesla Expands FSD Team with 600 Engineers
articles.summary: Tesla hires 600 engineers to accelerate Full Self-Driving development.

articles.title: Healthcare Network Adds 1,000 AI-Assisted Diagnostic Roles
articles.summary: Kaiser Permanente creates 1,000 new positions for AI-assisted diagnostics.
